ifnull(t9.currency_amount_tax_zfz, 0)- ifnull(t9.currency_amount_tax_yzf, 0)) as currency_amount_tax_wzf from s_fin_pay_bill_item_outsource_settle t LEFT JOIN sys_user u1 ON t.creator_account = u1.user_name LEFT JOIN sys_user u2 ON t.updater_account = u2.user_name LEFT JOIN s_fin_pay_bill t1 ON t.pay_bill_sid = t1.pay_bill_sid LEFT JOIN s_man_manufacture_outsource_settle t2 on t.manufacture_outsource_settle_sid = t2.manufacture_outsource_settle_sid LEFT JOIN s_bas_vendor t3 on t2.vendor_sid = t3.vendor_sid LEFT JOIN s_bas_company t4 on t2.company_sid = t4.company_sid LEFT JOIN s_bas_plant t5 on t2.plant_sid = t5.plant_sid LEFT JOIN s_con_doc_type_manufacture_outsource_settle t6 ON t2.document_type = t6.code LEFT JOIN s_con_bu_type_manufacture_outsource_settle t7 ON t2.business_type = t7.code LEFT JOIN s_pur_purchase_contract t8 ON t2.purchase_contract_sid = t8.purchase_contract_sid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT a.manufacture_outsource_settle_sid, sum(if(a1.handle_status = '3', a.currency_amount_tax, 0)) as currency_amount_tax_zfz, sum(if(a1.handle_status = '5', a.currency_amount_tax, 0)) as currency_amount_tax_yzf FROM s_fin_pay_bill_item_outsource_settle a LEFT JOIN s_fin_pay_bill a1 ON a.pay_bill_sid = a1.pay_bill_sid WHERE a1.handle_status in ('5','3') GROUP BY a.manufacture_outsource_settle_sid ) t9 on t.manufacture_outsource_settle_sid = t9.manufacture_outsource_settle_sid
